description.description: At Zapier we integrate with over 2,500 different APIs with our developer platform. Over the years I've been exposed to some really great and not so great examples of APIs and share what some of the best practices are with regards to API Design, Authentication and features that make people excited to integrate with them.

heroDescription.heroDescription: Avocado Labs is a way to keep people connected online and have access to quality talks. There will be live talks, which will then be uploaded, where expert speakers can share their knowledge. After each talk there will be a 5min Q&A where our speakers will be able to answer any related questions you may have. These episodes will be hosted and moderated by our Auth0 developer advocates to ensure a safe and friendly environment.

childMarkdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody: Avocado Labs is a way to keep people connected online and have access to quality talks. There will be live talks, which will then be uploaded, where expert speakers can share their knowledge. After each talk there will be a 5min Q&A where our speakers will be able to answer any related questions you may have. These episodes will be hosted and moderated by our Auth0 developer advocates to ensure a safe and friendly environment.

At Zapier we integrate with over 2,500 different APIs with our developer platform. Over the years I've been exposed to some really great and not so great examples of APIs and share what some of the best practices are with regards to API Design, Authentication and features that make people excited to integrate with them.

intro.intro: James was the first engineering hire at Zapier and over the past several years has held quite a variety of roles as both an engineer and a manager, building up the DevOps culture from scratch. When not building great tools that keeps Zapier running smoothly, James enjoys cycling, traveling and studying Mahayana Buddhism.

description.description: API Authentication Best Practices - James R Carr
